ygData.subject: Re: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: What exacly does whirling bloodstone and whirling malachite do? Ive hunted evil eyes a lot, and i mean  A LOT soloing them, to get many optic nerves and PBB s,
ygData.messageBody:
What exacly does whirling bloodstone and whirling malachite do? Ive hunted evil eyes a lot, and i mean A LOT soloing them, to get many optic nerves and PBB's, but ive never come accrost either of these items.

>Whirling Bloodstone and whirling malachite - Evil Eyes in Beholder. If you
>pull together a full party you could probably take on the eyes. Be careful
>though. they have nasty magics
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Trevalien [SMTP:trevalien@...]
>> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 2:03 PM
>> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>>
>> From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>>
>> Does anyone know where any of the folowing head peices can be obtained?
>> Also, are any of them obtainable by a lvl 15 ranger?
>>
>> Batfang Headband
>> Crown of Leaves
>> Crested Helmet
>> Executioner's Hood
>> Runed Circlet
>> Siryn Hair Hood (+13 chr for all of u in need)
>> Stone Circlet
>> Topknot Headband
>> Whirling Bloodstone
>> Whirling Malachite
>>
>> Trevalien
